sentences.english: Chocolate contains phenyl ethylamine, a mild mood elevator.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力含有苯基乙胺，是溫和的情緒調節劑。

sentences.english: Study was made on transparency and colorimetry of filter membrane with phenyl silicone rubber as main material.
sentences.chinese: 研究了以苯基硅橡膠爲基膠的濾光膜的透光率及色度。

sentences.english: This method covers the determination of the optical transmission of a 25 percent solution of triphenylphosphine in acetone.
sentences.chinese: 該方法用來測定25%三苯基膦丙酮溶液的光學性能。

sentences.english: The yield of N-phenyl maleimide was above 92 %.
sentences.chinese: 苯基馬來酰亞胺收率92%以上。

sentences.english: The infarct size was measured by the triphenyl tetrazolium chloride method.
sentences.chinese: 心肌梗塞面積通過三苯基四唑氯化物染色法測定。

sentences.english: The method is suitable for mass production of the phenyl iso-propenyloxysilane.
sentences.chinese: 本發明適用於苯基異丙烯氧基硅烷的批量生產。

sentences.english: Manufacture of Phenyl and Phenylethyl Malonic Esters.
sentences.chinese: 苯基和苯基乙基丙二酸酯的生產。

sentences.english: Manufacture of Phenyl and Phenylethyl Malonic Esters.
sentences.chinese: 苯基和苯基乙基丙二酸酯的生產。

definition: cyan/cyanide radical -CN, stable triple bond with chemical properties like halogens
